text: So then that who laid the foundation of his building on obedience to Allah and (His) agreements, attestations and good pleasures â€” is better, or that who laid the foundation of his building on an undetermined brink, of a precipice, ready to crumble down? So (this brink) crumbled down together with that (building) into the Fire of Hell. And Allah does not guide the nation of the transgressors
